title: Sakasquatch Sighting on The Cigar Authority
itunes:title: Sakasquatch Sighting on The Cigar Authority
description:
We are joined live and in studio by the beast known as Sakasquatch, aka Steve Saka and we light up a couple of cigars from Dunbarton Tobacco & Trust. In the first hour we light up a cigar from The Cigar Authority care package, Sobremesa. In the second hour we light up Mi Querida.

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority, live from Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

As always, you can find most of the cigars we talk about at www.2guyscigars.com
